ygData.subject: RE: Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From the official source: During last night s event, the Plane of Hate opened up a gate and let forth it s minions .  It is not open as yet, however.
ygData.messageBody:
At 12:25 PM 11/1/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Abraham Hardjana <ahardjan@...>
>
>Actually the Plane of Hate was opened last night with the conclusion of
>that disaterous quest that seemed to take the servers down. So rejoice in
>the fact that the zone is both open and populated =)


From the "official" source:
"During last night's event, the Plane of Hate 'opened up a gate and let
forth it's minions'. It is not open as yet, however. This is just a
preview of things to come."

Talies the still retired but rapidly rethinking it...
